basics.name: Angelo ~ Curriculum Vitae
basics.label: Multidisciplinary developer
basics.summary: A 18 year old developer from Indonesia. Interested and involved in a wide range of disciplines, from fullstack web development as a day job, to community moderation and management as a volunteer

volunteer.summary: A "melting pot" of many Indonesian Frontend community, targeting beginners to seniors to come and talk about frontend.
highlights: Initialized the community from scratch, with help from many community leader

awards.title: Shopee National Data Science Competition 2020 - Beginners Category

skills.name: Software and Technical
keywords: General proficiency with a range of systems and software
Experience in web hosting on Linux and management with Docker / Kubernetes
Additionally proficient in Dart, SQL, LaTeX and C (Competitive Programming)
Currently researching and learning Rust and Elixir

skills.name: Community Moderation
keywords: Experience with a range of platforms and communities
